property.help: the secondary melee action cannot be used from inventory, must be in hand

property.help: this forces a slow animation, good to be balanced during combat

property.name: Meshfile
property.help: this forces a slow animation, good to be even

property.name: Extends
property.help: because is much less trouble than specifically create_item for OpenBundle class

append.xpath: /items/item[ starts-with(@name, 'meleeWpnBladeT1HuntingKnife') or starts-with(@name, 'meleeWpnKnucklesT1IronKnuckles') or starts-with(@name, 'meleeWpnSledgeT1IronSledgehammer') or starts-with(@name, 'meleeWpnSpearT1IronSpear') or starts-with(@name, 'meleeToolAxeT1IronFireaxe') or starts-with(@name, 'meleeToolFarmT1IronHoe') or starts-with(@name, 'meleeToolPickT1IronPickaxe') or starts-with(@name, 'meleeToolShovelT1IronShovel') or starts-with(@name, 'meleeToolRepairT1ClawHammer') or starts-with(@name, 'armorIron') ]

/items/item[ starts-with(@name, 'meleeWpnSpearT3SteelSpear') or starts-with(@name, 'meleeWpnClubT3SteelClub') or starts-with(@name, 'meleeWpnSledgeT3SteelSledgehammer') or starts-with(@name, 'meleeWpnBladeT3Machete') or starts-with(@name, 'meleeWpnKnucklesT3SteelKnuckles') or starts-with(@name, 'armorSteel') ]

item.name: GSKTRFirstSpawnBundle
item.help: will enable CraftBundles cvars once. WORKAROUND: this one is important on a just started game, to let the big inventory 160 slots be synchronized preventing new items from being dropped randomly

item.name: GSKTheNoMadOverhaulBundleNoteBkp
item.help: just to let the player re-read calmly

item.name: GSKDbgNVBatteryCreate
item.help: lvl1 car battery with full energy using the charger post will let u create 2 strong NV (40 weak nv). lvl6 will be 4 strong nv.

triggered_effect.help: 2nd: sky at random spawn location at sky
2nd: sky at PREVIOUS random spawn location at sky

triggered_effect.message: GSK:TEST: PlayerSpawnedInWorld (reason: Died, position: 0, 0, 0): localplayer (this will trigger the script playerRespawnParachuteDaemon.sh)

item.name: GSKWorkAroundFixBuffs
item.help: some buffs may refuse to start working. this will fix them. Could this require the game engine to be stopped/exited and restarted to fix w/o usting this trick?

property.name: Class
